collection.name: HENI: Damien Hirst - The Empresses
collection.description:
The Empresses by Damien Hirst is a series of five glorious prints depicting carefully composed images of butterflies, published by HENI Editions. This HENI Editions NFT Deed allows you to delay receipt of the physical print until up to 5th February 2025. Redemption of the NFT Deed for the physical artwork will be possible from around August 2022. For more information, please see empresses.nft.heni.com.

The HENI Editions NFT Deed is a new category of NFTs offered by HENI, which are different to NFT drops by artists. These are utility NFTs provided by HENI which serve the specific purpose of delaying receipt of the physical and enabling ease of trading. There are no additional utilities or perks associated with this type of NFT.

The collection was minted on the Palm blockchain, which is a token-powered ecosystem for NFTs connected to Ethereum. NFTs can be moved between Palm and Ethereum using the Palm's NFT Bridge.
